eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Maricopa, AZ; at 07:38 PM ON JAN 19, 2026 Effective until 05:38 AM JAN 20, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Peoria Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Peoria Police Department is looking for a white male, Vincent Stover, 28 years-old, 5 foot 5 inches, 215 lbs., with black hair and brown eyes. Vincent was last seen on 01/19/2026 at 1030 hours, near the 11200 block of north 99th Avenue, Peoria, Arizona, Maricopa County. Vincent was last seen wearing a blue shirt, gray shorts and glasses. Vincent has a medical condition that can cause him to become easily confused and also suffers from paranoia around unknown people to include police. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
